datafield.subfield: National Afro-American Museum and Cultural Center (U.S.)
National Museum of Afro-American History and Culture (U.S.)
CIP galley (National Afro-American Museum and Cultural Center, Wilberforce, Ohio)
NUCMC data from Wilberforce University for National Museum of Afro-American History and Culture collection, 1978-1998

(The National Museum of Afro-American History and Culture was established in 1972 when the Ohio General Assembly passed a bill authorizing the Ohio Historical Society to establish a National Afro-American Museum in Wilberforce, Ohio, and to create the National Museum of Art History and Culture Planning Council to advise the Society on the development of the museum)
Ohio Historical Society WWW site, June 8, 2011
(National Afro-American Museum & Cultural Center; National Afro-American Museum and Cultural Center; Wilberforce, OH)
